##They look for masks overseas, encountered soaring prices, temporary breach of contract, "infernal affairs" snapped up

Weixin Signal Wowjiemian

Function introduction, the interface news is China has the influence original financial and economic new media, only serves the independent thinking crowd

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
Image: Visual China

Reporter: Zhao Meng

“

In the face of soaring prices, temporary breach of contract, or even "infernal" rush to buy and other emergencies, the Ministry of Finance issued a special request to simplify procurement procedures around the establishment of procurement "green channel. Experts say the move is expected to streamline overseas procurement efforts and help domestic supplies of medical supplies.

”

“

In the face of soaring prices, temporary breach of contract, or even "infernal" rush to buy and other emergencies, the Ministry of Finance issued a special request to simplify procurement procedures around the establishment of procurement "green channel. Experts say the move is expected to streamline overseas procurement efforts and help domestic supplies of medical supplies.

”

Zhu Yajun and the heads of four or five pharmaceutical companies wait anxiously in the reception room of a mask production company in Jiangxi Province on the eve of the Lunar New Year on January 24,2020.

Zhu Yajun is CEO of a pharmaceutical company in Guangzhou. The day before, the city of Wuhan was closed because of the new coronavirus outbreak. The domestic mask market was in a state of emergency. Many hospitals launched public donations on the Internet. Zhu Yajun also began helping some local governments to purchase masks.

"We were excited because we could ship ten million, " says Zhu, but there were so many companies that three days later, the mask company was taken over by the local government and only 5 percent of the shipments were distributed to several companies, "It's not enough for a big chain of pharmacies to stock up on. "

In the days that followed, as the search for masks became increasingly difficult at home, some companies and individuals, including Ms. Chu, set their sights on overseas markets. Meanwhile, as the epidemic spread, some large enterprises and overseas Chinese also began to move around the world to help Chinese hospitals look for face masks.

If the fight against an epidemic is a war, the one hundred thousand medics on the front line are soldiers, while countless companies and individuals around the world in search of masks and protective clothing form a huge "logistic support team" .

Times are tough, and every deal gets tough. In the face of soaring prices, temporary breach of contract, or even "infernal" snap-up and other emergencies, the Ministry of Finance issued a special request to simplify procurement procedures around the establishment of procurement "green channel. In the opinion of experts, the move is expected to gradually streamline overseas procurement work, effectively help domestic medical supplies.

###Chinese people all over the world are looking for masks

"If I were still working at the hospital, I would apply to the front line, " Zhu said.

Before the company, Zhu Yajun was also a doctor. Now he is no longer a doctor, but he can find supplies for his former comrades-in-arms, which makes him feel that he is still a member of the professional community, "still very meaningful. ".

Since early February, Zhu and his colleagues have been scouring the globe for masks to help local governments, which lack the resources and experience to pull through. Normally, a pack of 10 pieces of General Medical Mask, the retail price is about 2 ~ 3 yuan, but half a month later today, the foreign mask price, has increased to 3 ~ 4 yuan each, the price has increased 10 ~ 20 times.

On Feb. 14, Zhu bought a batch of 10 million masks from the Middle East through a trading company. The purchase price of the goods from the Middle East is 2.50 yuan each, but the price given to him has increased by 1 yuan, that is, 3.50 yuan each. That night, while the shipment was still in transit, he called and said that he had been given a portion of the shipment, leaving him with only six million.

A member of the Hunan Provincial Health Commission had planned to purchase a batch of masks for distribution to the province's Shidu community. He called on many relatives and friends abroad to find them from the European Union, Russia and Canada, but "tried everything" but failed to do so, can only apologize to everyone, "fortunately, special period, everyone can understand. "

This person told interface news, during the epidemic, many enterprises regardless of cost, to join the army of overseas procurement of materials. Sany is sweeping through the European Union and Russia, flying directly to the point of departure to transport the goods back to Hemerocallis Fulva airport for distribution to Wuhan and Hunan provinces.

Not long ago, Sany arrived at Hemerocallis Fulva airport after a seven-hour flight from Dubai, United Arab Emirates, with no passengers on board and 42,000 dupont medical suits on board.

Overseas Chinese are also helping. The source contacted Geng Tan, a Chinese Canadian who is now a member of parliament in Canada, who has spent more than 10 days in the region collecting donations and purchasing supplies to be sent to the country. Chinese Canadian, an entrepreneur, has also mobilized entrepreneurial forces and donated large numbers of masks and other materials.

A friend of this person was traveling in Argentina during the Spring Festival. He was informed of an outbreak of the disease in his country. The holiday turned into a shopping trip. "He didn't rest for more than 10 days. He searched for a mask everywhere he went. " A total of more than 8,000 masks were purchased and eventually donated to the domestic anti-epidemic front.

Not everyone can successfully buy masks from overseas.

Ms. Wang, a Chengdu resident, went to Cambodia to spend the Spring Festival with her family on January 19. On that day, she passed through the customs at the airport and did not see anyone wearing a mask. However, the next day the news broke that there was "family-to-family transmission, " and she found that many people in her circle of friends were buying masks everywhere. On Jan. 23, she asked a friend who had traveled from the country to Cambodia to bring a box of masks for her family. By this time, disposable surgical masks in Cambodia, has been sold for $20 a box, usually less than $4.

Ms. Wang also wants to buy some masks to donate and give to friends. Through personal contacts, she contacted friends in Thailand, Qatar, Turkey, Germany and other places, each other told her, long out of stock. A Qatari friend told her, "even if I had the goods, I wouldn't know how to get them back because the flights were stopped. "

Later, Ms. Wang contacted a South Korean friend whose husband, who was close to the head of a mask company, promised to sell her 3,000 masks. She rushed the money through, but a few days later the person replied that South Korea had imposed temporary restrictions on individuals buying large quantities of face masks, and that "orders were cancelled. "

###270,000 masks encounter 'infernal affairs'

Even if find goods smoothly, to buy successful and transport back to the country, there are still many variables.

The fluctuation of mask prices is still restrained in China, but this epidemic has become a global event, foreign suppliers "sit on the ground and start prices" has become the norm.

Once, Zhu Yajun contacted a batch of masks, shipping price 3 yuan each, but is ready to pay within an hour, the other side suddenly raised the price. Since it is to help the government procurement, Zhu Yajun needs to re-coordinate the views of all parties, "exhausted. ".

To make matters worse, the money to call the past, agreed on the delivery and arrival time, but when they went to pick up the goods, found nothing, "this kind of stood up a lot of cases. "

Peng Shuai, the CEO of a Chengdu based company, has been coordinating efforts to find masks in the United States, Europe, Japan and Southeast Asia since the outbreak began. "You have 60 minutes to think about it, " he says, after a quotation from a well-connected supplier. After 60 minutes, it could be another price.

On Jan. 29, Peng Shuai and some friends found a shipment in Jakarta, Indonesia, paid for it, and arranged for it to be shipped on Jan. 31, straight to international logistics. Peng Shuai was excited to find a supply of Chinese made masks, many of which come from China, which has no exports at all.

But shortly after their order, the manufacturer suddenly contacted his friend to ask if the client was coming to pick up the goods on the spot. The other side said that the person who took out the bill of lading, the information on it is very accurate. His friend was taken aback and told him that he had not entrusted anyone to pick up the goods, which he flatly refused.

WHO's this guy who's picking up a shipment in the name of Peng Shuai and his friends? Where did he get the procurement information? This surprised Peng Shuai.

Not only that, but this impersonation of the situation also occurred a second time. We feel that things are not good, worried about accidents in transit, so repeatedly told manufacturers, do not send first, wait for their own people to pick up the goods. In order to guard against unnecessary risks, after the communication, they only call the text.

During this period, someone offered two or three times the price to take this batch of goods, mask factory boss also vacillated. In desperation, they can only find friends in Jakarta well-known face communication, to put the mask factory boss.

On the night of Jan. 31, a friend of Peng Shuai's flew from Singapore to Jakarta, where he had to switch to a motorcycle as soon as he got off the plane. 276000 masks, 1,358 kg, in 138 cases. They are non-professional foreign trade personnel, how to load and unload, consignment, storage, what procedures to go through, need to handle themselves.

Fortunately, all parties in an emergency support, a friend working in the China Resources Group, to help coordinate a reliable logistics channel.

They personally watched the masks leave the warehouse, loaded them into cars, counted them, and then discreetly escorted them to the airport. At that time, there are no direct flights from Jakarta to Beijing, can only fly to Singapore, then transfer to Beijing.

But when they counted the quantity in Beijing, they found that there were only 80 cases. They immediately contacted the airline. It turned out that there was a problem with the plane's cabin space. The next day, 58 cases were sent to us, and everyone had a false alarm.

###Overseas procurement mechanism will be rationalized gradually

In addition to the scarcity of goods, price changes, money is not out of the problem.

Overseas purchases are typically made to foreign companies, most of which are settled in dollars, after China imposed strict controls on capital outflows, particularly on the amount of foreign exchange individuals can buy each year. In the second round of overseas procurement process, to the settlement of a lot of trouble.

"You have to go through this and that to buy foreign exchange, but the goods don't wait for people, they may be gone, " Peng Shuai said. Recently, he helped several state-owned enterprises and local governments purchase medical supplies overseas, and they ended up stuck with money that couldn't get out. "If only money could fly by itself, " he lamented.

Liu Lu, a purchasing official at a sichuan-based company, told interface news that the exchange control policy has left many local governments and small and medium-sized enterprises to seek help from large enterprises with overseas settlement channels. Even a city in Sichuan can only entrust a Japanese company, the Ito-Yokado, with the settlement of a large quantity of medical supplies.

Liu Lu's company has branches overseas, and settlement is relatively convenient. Since before the Spring Festival, her company has been flooded with requests for help from local governments and small and medium-sized enterprises. For this reason, the company has set up a dedicated purchasing team to search for masks and protective clothing around the world.

"In times of crisis, rigid adherence to the rules can delay many, many things, " Peng Shuai said. Several times during this period of assistance to the local government in the purchase of goods, money was paid, but a few minutes later, the goods were taken.

A few days ago, a friend of Peng Shuai's, while guarding a South Korean factory, and a local government docking, "there is an urgent, and this side to step by step process, the process did not go to 1 / 3, the goods are gone. "

"If we continue to follow party a's purchasing mentality, we may delay the aircraft, " Peng Shuai said, "But the question is, are we prioritising risk aversion or problem solving? A quick fix is always a risk. "

Liu Lu had a similar experience. Not long ago, she helped to find resources, found a batch of masks to contact the local government docking personnel, the other side asked whether there are invoices and contracts and other matters, the next day to give her a plan.

Liu cong-hu, a professor at Renmin University of China and an expert in government procurement, analyzed the interface news. Since 2003, the Chinese government has implemented a "centralized procurement" system, in which each unit purchases more than a certain amount of materials, procurement must be entrusted to the Public Resources Trading Centre and the procurement staff is accountable for the audit. Some local government departments have neither access to overseas procurement nor experience in overseas procurement.

Liu cong-hu said that according to the provisions of the Government Procurement Law, overseas purchases are imports. In non-emergency situations, first, import approval needs to be conducted, and secondly, it is demonstrated that the imported materials are indeed unable to meet the domestic requirements. After these two conditions are met, to initiate the procurement process.

He said that every time he was invited to give a lecture to the government, he had to remind people to be aware of the risks involved in procurement, which over the years has developed a habit of caution. Coupled with the lack of channels and experience, in response to the initial procurement of materials inevitably passive, "this is understandable. ". To this end, he also wrote a special internal reference submitted to the relevant departments.

The interface news noted that on 26 January, the Ministry of Finance issued the circular on procurement facilitation for Epidemic Prevention and control, "state organs, institutions and organizations at all levels that use financial funds to procure goods, projects and services related to epidemic prevention and control shall establish 'green passages' for procurement with the primary goal of meeting the needs of epidemic prevention and control, and may not implement the methods and procedures stipulated in the law on government procurement, and no approval is required for the procurement of imported materials. "

It may take time to change the "inertia" of government officials toward procurement, Liu said, but the "notice, " which is equivalent to a "Sword of state, " will allay many of the concerns of government officials in the procurement process, in the future, the overseas purchase work should be straightened out gradually.

Liu Lu was given a pseudonym at the request of the interviewee
